lead_paragraph: Once known as the “Bloody Bucket” for its history of crime, the lounge has reemerged in recent years as a bar full of psychedelic, ramshackle charm.

headline.print_headline: When to Leave? Check the Lava Lamp
headline.main: At a Chinatown Bar, Libations Sipped by the Light of Disco Balls

snippet: Once known as the “Bloody Bucket” for its history of crime, the lounge has reemerged in recent years as a bar full of psychedelic, ramshackle charm.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column profiles 169 Bar, Chinatown club where customers chill under bright disco-era lighting.
